metadata.title: CVE-2024-1077 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in Network in Google Chrome prior to 121.0.6167.139 alloweda remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a maliciousfile. (Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
